meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of peroxisomes.
meanings.sent1: The peroxisomal enzymes help break down fatty acids.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the peroxisomal structure of the cell.
meanings.sent3: The peroxisomal party in the cell was a real hit!
meanings.sent4: Her peroxisomal dedication to cleanliness was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The peroxisomal glow of the cell was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The peroxisomal organelle plays a crucial role in metabolism.
meanings.sent2: The peroxisomal content of the cell was carefully analyzed.
meanings.sent3: The peroxisomal surprise inside the cell amazed the researchers.
meanings.sent4: His peroxisomal heart was full of energy and vitality.
meanings.sent5: The peroxisomal presence in the cell was undeniable.

meanings.sent1: The peroxisomal function is essential for cellular health.
meanings.sent2: The peroxisomal activity in the cell was monitored closely.
meanings.sent3: The peroxisomal adventure inside the cell was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her peroxisomal journey through the cell was enlightening.
meanings.sent5: The peroxisomal impact on cell metabolism was profound.
